name: JPMorgan Prepares to Accept Bitcoin and Ether as Loan Collateral: Report
description: The oxidized Cleric links the volatile core—a pulsing cyan-magenta sovereign—to the slow, wet porcelain gears. Collateral rendered manifest through sacred geometry and grit, binding the kinetic debt to the analog mechanism. The circuit hums with newly shackled value.

properties.caption: The oxidized Cleric links the volatile core—a pulsing cyan-magenta sovereign—to the slow, wet porcelain gears. Collateral rendered manifest through sacred geometry and grit, binding the kinetic debt to the analog mechanism. The circuit hums with newly shackled value.
